author: Chris Allen
comment: I was interested in the Android Wear function, but not good at present. Gpx track imported OK, but not much use with no background map. Also GPS didn't hold lock - normally ok on the watch, but not with this so overall pretty poor.

reply.author: Geolives Belgium S.P.R.L.
reply.content: Hello. Sorry, as explained in the product description, our Android Wear application is experimental at the moment, with only some features to follow trails. We will see if there are many requests to continue the development of this Android Wear application (at the moment, we don't have a lot of requests for this Android Wear app). Best regards.

author: Edward Hitchcock
comment: This app gives access to openstreetmap map worldwide. Unfortunately not opencyclemap which is most useful for cycllists.  No other layers either.   In most respects atlogis apps are better.  The New Zealand one gives nz maps plus open x maps worldwide.  Atlogis gives more flexibility for map downloads.  Sitytrail France is excellent for its IGN maps of Framce.
